body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Research     Permitting                Permitting        Fatclaw scorpion NPS Photo / Don Endicott       For researchers interested in conducting scientific studies in the parks who would like information on the scope of research for each park as well as funding opportunities, please visit the Southern California Research Learning Center website. All research in the parks requires a valid National Park Service research permit. Permits may be obtained at the NPS Research Permits and Reporting System website.
title: Cabrillo National Monument: Permitting
